XUsbPs_EpSetup Struct Reference

#include <xusbps.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

u32 Type
u32 NumBufs
u32 BufSize
u16 MaxPacketSize

Detailed Description

Data structures used to configure endpoints.

Member Data Documentation

u32 XUsbPs_EpSetup::BufSize

Buffer size. Only relevant for OUT (receive) Endpoints.

u16 XUsbPs_EpSetup::MaxPacketSize

Maximum packet size for this endpoint. This number will define the maximum number of bytes sent on the wire per transaction. Range: 0..1024

u32 XUsbPs_EpSetup::NumBufs

Number of buffers to be handled by this endpoint.

u32 XUsbPs_EpSetup::Type

Endpoint type:

  • XUSBPS_EP_TYPE_CONTROL
  • XUSBPS_EP_TYPE_ISOCHRONOUS
  • XUSBPS_EP_TYPE_BULK
  • XUSBPS_EP_TYPE_INTERRUPT
